text: Body Language is the ninth studio album by Australian singer Kylie Minogue. It was recorded during the summer of 2003 in the United Kingdom, Ireland and Spain, and released on 20 November 2003 by Parlophone. The album contains three official singles, "Slow", "Red Blooded Woman" and "Chocolate". == Track listing == == Other websites == *Body Language on Kylie Minogue's official website Category:2003 albums Category:Kylie Minogue albums Category:Pop albums Category:Dance-pop albums Category:R&B; albums
title: Body Language (Kylie Minogue album)
